messages.content: WHY WE NEED CHANGE IN BRITAIN TODAY

messages.title: 60 SECOND Q&A WITH MARK PRISK
messages.content: Questions on local community, re-election priorities, Stansted Airport, pensions, and job creation.

messages.title: MARK PRISK: A RECORD OF ACTION
messages.content: Highlights on saving post offices, NHS benefits, and stopping Harlow North.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fought hard to save local post offices from closure.
Battled for better health services, including securing X-ray facilities and two new health centres.
Backs local people and their families, and opposes Labour's regional housing plans.

issues.health: Securing X-ray facilities and two new health centres

housing.content: Backs local people and their families, opposes Labour's regional housing plans, supports local decision-making on housing issues.

politicalExperience.achievements: Saving post offices, battling for better health services, and fighting against regional housing plans.

endorsements.endorsement: A message encouraging change and endorsing the Conservative Party.

images.caption: Campaign images featuring Mark Prisk, David Cameron with the public, and people concerned with various local issues.
